job_tasks.phrase: Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system across different use cases, including multimodal conversation, long-term memory, chitchat, intent recognition and others
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of researching, understanding, and applying advanced AI/ML techniques (deep learning, NLP) to improve a specific system (dialog system), which aligns with the definition of model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates collaboration with various business and technical teams (product, engineering, content policy) to align the AI/ML work with broader use cases and releases, demonstrating an understanding of business context and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase involves the practical application and integration of new methods and architectural improvements to enhance the operational aspects (quality, performance, latency, throughput, efficiency) of models, which falls under software development and integration for production systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the outcome of the work as building products for a large user base, which is a typical software engineering responsibility, focusing on the end-product delivery.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy' explicitly describes collaboration and communication with different teams and stakeholders.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on researching and improving a dialog system using deep learning and NLP techniques (1.B.1). While there are elements of introducing new architectures and creating products for users (1.A.1), the core emphasis is on the ML model development and research aspect. There is no mention of Generative AI specific tasks like prompt engineering or RAG. The collaboration with stakeholders (3.1) supports the integration aspect but doesn't shift the primary focus away from traditional ML/NLP model improvement.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to ML model research and improvement in NLP. It specifies the domain (dialog systems) and the types of tasks involved. However, it lacks explicit mention of specific technologies or tools, and the 'create products' part is a bit general, preventing a perfect score. The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is clear as GenAI is not mentioned.
